CN.content:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

In the given paragraph, the two entities "PQCDTB" and "PCZDTB" are clear "Material Name" entities. There are no other entities to remove.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 10 The absorption spectrum of PQCDTB is broadened and red - shifted compared to that of PCZDTB.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption spectrum |
| PQCDTB |
| PCZDTB |

The paragraph mentions three properties: the "absorption spectrum" of PQCDTB and PCZDTB, and the "red-shifted" property of the absorption spectrum of PQCDTB compared to that of PCZDTB. However, since "red-shifted" is not explicitly written as "red shifted," I am not sure if it should be considered a separate property. Therefore, I have only included "absorption spectrum," PQCDTB, and PCZDTB as valid entities in the table.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| absorption spectrum |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, I have determined that only one property is mentioned: the "absorption spectrum" of PQCDTB and PCZDTB. The other terms, PQCDTB and PCZDTB, do not clearly refer to material properties, so I have not included them in the table.
